summary: Replace the default warpaints with WAAARpaints (WIP)
descriptionHtml:
This mods goal is the replacement of the default warpaint textures with ones that look a bit more intimidating....like warpaints should be.

Imagine you are in the middle of a medieval battlefield where action is taking place...you are in the heart of utter chaos, hundreds of men charging at your general direction...Do you want your facepaint to say \"look how pretty i am\" or \"you are better off going for the next guy in sight\"???

Due to the number of textures involved (around 108 if i counted correctly ) any kind of inspirational input is more than welcome...also if you like some default warpaint and would like to see it stay ingame, dont hesitate to suggest so...there is plenty of ground to cover.

FEEL FREE TO SUBMIT PICS OF YOUR CHARACTERS WEARING WAAARpaint :D
---------------------------------------------------
Version Notes:

0.3 Added Redguard male warpaints (and copies for the females)

0.2 corrected female textures to compensate for Beths \"2 inches to the left\" mapping, further improved generic warpaints...textures from now on will be1024x1024 [vanilla is 256x256]
0.1c added copies of the generic male warpaints as female variants (thnx to Mikester112) until all the male textures are done, females will receive copies of the male textures.
0.1b improved (?) generic male warpaints
0.1a replaced all generic male warpaints with custom ones

To do:

Near future - Nord males 
Down the road - rest of the  races  / create some gender specific generic warpaints

Note: Until i am done with the male warpaints...females will be receiving a copy of the male warpaint, upon completion the ladies will get some more specific attention.


*****************************************************************************
Using the Nexus Mod Manager is highly recommended.
*****************************************************************************

Manual Install:
Extract the archive in your Skyrim Installation folder

Manual Uninstall:
Delete maleheadwarpaint_01 to _10.dds and femaleheadwarpaint_01 to _10.dds from your  \\data\\textures\\actors\\character\\character assets\\tintmasks

****************************************************************************
Redistribution with or without further editing is prohibited without my prior consent.
*****************************************************************************
